long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔍 Link Follow Detector – Instantly Visualize NoFollow and DoFollow Links! 🌐
Enhance your web browsing and SEO analysis with Link Follow Detector! This powerful tool helps you quickly identify NoFollow and DoFollow links on any webpage. Say goodbye to manual link checking – Link Follow Detector does the work for you in seconds.

🚀 Key Features:
✅ Highlight NoFollow Links:
Easily identify links with the NoFollow attribute, outlined in red for quick recognition. Perfect for spotting links that don't pass SEO value!

✅ Highlight DoFollow Links:
Instantly spot links without the NoFollow attribute, highlighted with a green outline. Ideal for identifying valuable backlinks.

✅ List DoFollow Links:
View a complete list of all DoFollow links on the page, including their anchor text and URLs. A must-have feature for SEO audits and link analysis.

✅ Toggle Switch Interface:
Effortlessly activate or deactivate NoFollow and DoFollow link highlights with intuitive toggle switches.

🔒 Privacy First:
The extension only requires access to webpages for link detection. Your data and privacy are never compromised.

📥 Try Link Follow Detector now and streamline your SEO workflow!

Contact : contact@influsweb.com
